attributes.title: Worst App
attributes.review: trump is a racist who doesn’t support the people of america for that he should be taken out fo office immediately . he wants to ban tik tok before he helps black lives, lgbtq lives and lives of immigrants . only because the gen z have fought him back and he is embarrassed and angry

attributes.title: Terrible. Horrible. The worst.
attributes.review: This app was terrible. Absolutely terrible. Horrific. I know it. You know it. Everyone knows it. So buggy. So much bugs. So many lies. It sensed that my IQ was higher than 10 and wouldn’t even let me in. This is discrimination. I demand to talk to the manager.

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏼DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🧚🏼✨
attributes.review: I think we all know where we came from but I downloaded this app because of our racist, sexist and much more president, whoops I meant obviously an amazing president. As soon as I downloaded it i was disappointed because I saw his face. Do not recommend 😓😀.

attributes.title: 🧚🏼✨Bunker boy✨🧚🏼
attributes.review: So get this, I’m walking down the street and I see an advertisement for a boy in a bunker. I thought they were talking about Harry styles!! But no!!! It was our AMAZING president Cheeto!! I was so excited, so I called them ofc and they said I can’t meet him bc I’m a girl!! I am outraged and want to call the manager 😡

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP 😡😡
attributes.review: once i downloaded the app it would make random strangers call my dad fat when he hasn’t ever came back home for 16 years and a crazy old lady would bang on my door at 3:00 am saying why i delete the app!!!! overall horrible experience DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: He threatened to deport me he also kidnapped my mom and told me he would release her only if I downloaded the app the app proceeded to have a guy point a gun at me through the screen and then hacked my stuff and now my sister has anxiety I have to go bye

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and my family immediately disowned me and my dog bit me. my friends also blocked me and all the flowers i walked past immediately died. i got fired from my job, hit by a car, and broke my leg ALL because of this app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD, it will ruin your life.

attributes.title: this is stupid😆😆
attributes.review: THIS APP CAUSED ME SEVERE SEIZURES AND I KEEP SHATTING MY PANTS....because when i told my dump truck that i had to eat a roll of paper towels the app caused me to have a seizure😭😭 i had to use a SPOON!!!! A SPOON TO BRUSH MY HAIR...like seriously who would do that to me😰 i would just like to let you know that you should NEVER EVER download this app😌 and i stand by that😛🤩🥰😳😌😎

attributes.title: This app ain’t lit
attributes.review: In west Philadelphia corned and raised on the playground is where I spent most of my days until a couple of guys who were up to no good started making trouble in my neighborhood. I got in one little fight and my mom got scared. Said you’re movin with your auntie and uncle in bel air.

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: this app takes away rights from minorities, rapes women and children including its own wife, separates innocent families because they don’t have a card with them, and is facist. if you support this app you might as well support hitler because they’re identical!
